titleStmt.title: Prayers prevalencie for Israels safety. Declared in a sermon preached in Saint Margarets Westminster, before the Honourable House of Commons, at the late solemne fast, June 28. 1643. / By Thomas Carter, minister of Dynton in Buckingham-shire. ; Published by order of that House.
titleStmt.author: Carter, Thomas, d. 1646.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Cotes, and are to be sold by John Bellamie and Ralph Smith, at the signe of the three golden Lions in Cornhill, neare the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
